name: Amenity
description:
Amenity is a small scoring game in which you race the void by navigating around a gravity center. Score by popping spheres giving you an advantage on the void scaled with your score multiplier. Your multiplier will reset if you get too close to the center. Following the theme, the center represents a comfort zone. Stay too long in it and there won't be anything for you out there anymore. Stay as far from it as you can and you will be surprised how much your world can grow.

Play with the keyboard axis or the controller joystick.

This game has been made for Global Game Jam 2019 with the theme comfort zone.
